question: In a condition of monopoly, the monopolist has a control over the price he charges for his product. In which of the following conditions he will be able to maximize his profits?
option1: Lowering the prices if the demand curve is elastic
option2: Lowering the price, if the demand curve is inelastic
option3: Raising the price, if the demand curve is elastic
answer: Lowering the prices if the demand curve is elastic
